MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G76 postcode area of Clarkston. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out essential maintainence on a transformer near Carmunoch Road at 11:00am. This may affect your electricity supply but we aim to have your supply back to normal within 15 minutes. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:20am on Thursday, 08 April 2021
